references.title: Interactive interface of Apple Vision Pro AR glasses during a Tesco shopping experience by Chris Watterston
references.description: Interactive interface of Apple Vision Pro AR glasses during a Tesco shopping experience by Chris Watterston, showcasing various features such as a checkout option with Apple Pay, Tesco Clubcard integration, a shopping list with items like Robinsons Orange No Added Sugar Squash and Tesco Swede, voice commands with Siri, and a product scanning function.

references.title: Augmented reality view through Apple Vision Pro AR glasses showing an entrance to a Tesco store
references.description: Augmented reality view through Apple Vision Pro AR glasses showing an entrance to a Tesco store with a promotional sign saying 'Shopping just got a lot more exciting' and a welcome screen prompting to connect the Vision Pro for better Tesco results.

references.title: Augmented reality interface inside a Tesco store viewed through Apple Vision Pro AR glasses, featuring a personal welcome message
references.description: Augmented reality interface inside a Tesco store viewed through Apple Vision Pro AR glasses, featuring a personal welcome message, Clubcard connection screen, and voice-activated Siri assistance for shopping and starting a workout for step counting.

references.title: User perspective of a grocery aisle with an augmented reality overlay from Apple Vision Pro AR glasses displaying a shopping list with items
references.description: User perspective of a grocery aisle with an augmented reality overlay from Apple Vision Pro AR glasses displaying a shopping list with items such as Robinsons Orange No Added Sugar Squash, Tesco Swede, Vita Coco Natural Coconut Water, and Tesco Closed Cup Mushrooms, including a directions icon for navigation.

references.title: First-person view inside a grocery store with an augmented reality navigation path marked by red arrows on the floor
references.description: First-person view inside a grocery store with an augmented reality navigation path marked by red arrows on the floor, as seen through Apple Vision Pro AR glasses, with a minimized shopping list tab at the bottom of the view.

references.title: Close-up view of a shopper's hand holding a bottle of Robinsons Orange No Added Sugar Squash in a grocery store
references.description: Close-up view of a shopper's hand holding a bottle of Robinsons Orange No Added Sugar Squash in a grocery store, with an augmented reality overlay showing the item being scanned and checked off a shopping list on Apple Vision Pro AR glasses

references.title: Close-up view of a shopper's hand holding a bottle of Robinsons in a grocery store
references.description: Close-up view of a shopper's hand holding a bottle of Robinsons Orange No Added Sugar Squash in a grocery store, with an augmented reality overlay showing the item being scanned and checked off a shopping list on Apple Vision Pro AR glasses

references.title: A first-person view of a grocery store aisle, with an augmented reality banner from Apple Vision Pro AR glasses displaying TESCO Great shop
references.description: A first-person view of a grocery store aisle, with an augmented reality banner from Apple Vision Pro AR glasses displaying 'TESCO Great shop, Chris, you've completely cleared your list.' and a checkout icon, indicating the completion of the shopping list.

references.title: view of a grocery store aisle, with an augmented reality banner from Apple Vision Pro AR glasses displaying 'TESCO Great shop, Chris, you've completely cleared your list.
references.description: A first-person view of a grocery store aisle, with an augmented reality banner from Apple Vision Pro AR glasses displaying 'TESCO Great shop, Chris, you've completely cleared your list.' and a checkout icon, indicating the completion of the shopping list.

references.title: supermarket at the checkout area with an augmented reality display from Apple Vision Pro AR glasses showing a checkout interface Tesco
references.description: View inside a supermarket at the checkout area with an augmented reality display from Apple Vision Pro AR glasses showing a checkout interface with a total guide price, savings, and an option to pay using Apple Pay, along with a scrollable list of grocery items such as Robinsons Orange No Added Sugar Squash and Tesco Closed Cup Mushrooms.

description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Since the launch of Apple Vision Pro, I WANTED to explore an out-of-the-box concept usage for the new technology that an everyday person could use and benefit from","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":".","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
